alert.note: Alert for Lee; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 7:30PM EDT until June 15 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Lee County in southwestern Georgia... Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 730 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Leesburg, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dawson, Leesburg, Smithville, Sasser, Bronwood, Parrott, Bridges Crossroad, Herod, Jordan Place, Yeomans, Clarks Mill, Dawson Municipal A/P, Starksville, Byne Crossroads, Graves, Scrutchins, Armena, Oakville, Chambliss and Olivers Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
